channel.title: Need Help (Making Server Public)
channel.description: Okay, I got this client that I changed.. And I can log on but now I want to make it public. I got a no-ip host. and I port forwarded. But I need to know how I can get people to use my client and play with me..

item.title: Need Help (Making Server Public)
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Are you sure you portforwarded? Because there is TuT’s and they are wrong. Its better if you self port forward. In the description, write in: ‘‘MoparS1’’ then after check if its on TCP then go to your start menu, take that called run or search it then type in: ‘‘Ipconfig’’ and find that called Ipv4adress write that in private ip and in port and private port write in 43594 in the both. Then enable it, press apply change. And go on canyouseeme.org write in 43594 and if it says Succes. People can join your server with your No-IP host. If you still got problems, try google it ~ Yóur Mastér

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help (Making Server Public)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Configure your static IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help (Making Server Public)
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

go too canyouseeme.org and put in the port you think your portforwarding if its closed then thats your problem. your probably connecting to your server through your local host, and not the ip everyone else needs too connect too it with.

Read full topic
